info.name: Gold on light yellow (page specific)
info.description:
It's for the guide about German Pronunciation Tips for singers on a Stanford.edu site. Just made it easier on the eyes from it's plain html-ness.
For http://www.stanford.edu/~jrb/reference/german.html
It's not necessarily page specific.

style.css:
body { width: 500px; margin: 0 auto; background-color: #FFFFE0; font-family: georgia;}

dt { color: #A45209; }
